page.title: 11NORTH RONALDSAY SCHOOL
page.content: In a small school like this we are able to pursue a wide variety of interests. Our maths and reading schemes are similar to any other in the country,but our environmental studies programme can cover sponge-ware pottery found on the beach to an in depth study of oil related to Flotta and the oil-rigs we regularly see being towed by our island. Learning in such an environment is both interesting and exciting. The following children actively contributed to this project:- Peter Gordon(10),Ingrid Tulloch(10), Keith Gordon(9),Alison Muir(8),Meike Woodbridge(8),Maurice Thomson(7),Ruth Swanney(7),Gillian Swanney(7),Wendy Deyell(7),Ronald Anderson(7),Spike Woodbridge(6) and Marion Muir(5).
